example.name: the one example
example.text: Shaken by tumbling stock prices and pessimistic projections of U.S. economic growth, currency analysts around the world have toned down their assessments of the dollar's near-term performance.
example.arg: Shaken by tumbling stock prices and pessimistic projections of U.S. economic growth
their assessments of the dollar's near-term performance
